column4: hi. dueo to some unknown reason my ubuntu grub has started showing itself without timer and sits there and does nothing. my keyboard can not be detected at grub level so i can not press enter. right now i am from live fedora. how can i edit my ubuntu grub file in order to force it select default entry and boot into ubuntu? help please?

hi. dueo to some unknown reason my ubuntu grub has started showing itself without timer and sits there and does nothing. before this i set it to not show itself and automatically select default entry and boot into ubuntu and it was working fine. my keyboard can not be detected at grub level so i can not press enter. right now i am from live fedora. how can i edit my ubuntu grub file in order to force it select default entry and boo
the guide shows the commands to run to mount the partitions and systems, then chroot
this is live fedora. no plugins to view the video! :-(
no need for the video, the text is all you need
i dont know if its a bug or what? cause it also affect fedora
then I suggest you report one and state where is works and not works
if you run:  sudo update-grub   does it get added?
yes i ran update-grub and it do not work
the guys in #grub may be able to help some
